verses.roman:
mokṣādi ānanda yāra nahe eka 'kaṇa'
pūrṇānanda-prāpti tāṅra caraṇa-sevana

synonyms: mokṣa-ādi—liberation and so on; ānanda—transcendental bliss; yāra—whose; nahe—not; eka—even; kaṇa—a fragment; pūrṇa-ānanda-prāpti—attainment of completely blissful life; tāṅra caraṇa-sevana—service to His lotus feet.
translation: "The happiness of liberation, whereby one merges into the Lord's existence, cannot even be compared to a fragment of the transcendental bliss obtained by service unto the Lord's lotus feet.
